hero.title: Web Developer
hero.description: Book your free consultation with me now

about.description: Hi! I’m Tayfun “Tai” Savas Boas AYA – a web developer and digital strategist. I call Lake Constance (Bodensee) and beautiful Switzerland home. With my small family, I explore the world. I work flexibly – whether remotely or at my Razor-Point à la Tony Stark.
about.description-core: Passionate about IT, AI and marketing, I craft visually captivating websites, SaaS products and apps that delight, convert and scale sustainably.

benefit.flexibility: I am very flexible at work. Whether in a modern working environment on site or remotely - I adapt to your needs.
benefit.openminded: For me, programming and marketing are more than technical disciplines – they’re creative problem-solving and digital art.
benefit.excellence: Premium-Quality over quantity – I place great value on effective communication and smooth onboarding processes.

developer.description: On my journey, I’ve applied modern frontend technologies and innovative concepts across diverse projects.
developer.description-core: I remain curious and open to new methods, constantly expanding my superpowers in web development.
developer.sub-description: Feel free to reach out – I’m here to support you from the very first idea to the final product, always with transparency, efficiency, and genuine passion.

projects.description: Experience my projects in action – witness firsthand how innovative digital experiences are brought to life. Dive into a curated selection of my work, interact directly with the projects, and get inspired by what my team and I can create for you.

join.name: Join CMS
join.description: Streamline your project management with ease! Inspired by the Kanban system, the JOIN Task Manager features an intuitive drag-and-drop interface that lets you create tasks, assign team members, and maintain full oversight – ensuring sustainable success for your business.

pollo.name: El Pollo Loco
pollo.description: An action-packed jump 'n' run adventure built on dynamic, in-depth JavaScript object-oriented programming. Help Pepe collect coins and salsa bottles as he battles a crazy chicken to rescue his beloved Maria – pure excitement and fun guaranteed!

portfolio.name: 15K Portfolio
portfolio.description: A premium showcase of my projects that highlights meticulous attention to detail. Experience 100% transparency and top-quality work – because I value excellence over quantity and collaborate closely with my clients.

reviews.sectionTitle: What my colleagues say about me

marc.name: Marc Braun
marc.text: Working with Ty was extremely productive, inspiring, and tremendously enriching. The chemistry within our team was excellent, and this was clearly reflected in the quality of our projects. Tayfun has a bright future ahead. His boundless motivation and captivating commitment greatly contributed to the positive atmosphere in the team. One can feel his positive aura and the passion he ignites.

lyonel.name: Lyonel Berzen
lyonel.text: I had the pleasure of working with Ty Savas Boas on a joint project. His positive attitude and entrepreneurial spirit were real assets to the team, consistently keeping motivation high. Tayfun was characterized by his openness to suggestions for improvement and often brought in fresh ideas. Ty has an eye for detail, and his experience in the branding and marketing industry has been a particular asset.

fabion.name: Fabion Latifi
fabion.text: It was a great pleasure to work with Ty Savas Boas AYA alias Taironman. His positive energy and motivational spirit significantly uplifted our team and contributed to our collective success. Tayfun has the innate ability to encourage team members to deliver their best work, consistently adding valuable insights during brainstorming sessions. His innovative thinking and proactive approach were instrumental in driving our projects forward. Furthermore, Tayfun is very detail-oriented and pays attention to the little things that others might overlook.

marc2.name: Marc Braun II
marc2.text: Ty has an extraordinary ability to maintain an overview and act with a goal-oriented approach. Even in crisis situations, he remains calm and solution-oriented. His professional approach and wisdom, especially at such a young age, have deeply impressed me. Tayfun also demonstrates a strong capacity for self-reflection and continuous improvement. I look forward to executing more projects with Tayfun in the future and am convinced that his skills and personality will enrich any team.

lyonel2.name: Lyonel Berzen II
lyonel2.text: His tireless perseverance, especially in crisis situations, in which he remained calm, focused and solution-oriented, is remarkable. His ability to solve problems quickly and effectively was particularly impressive. He was also reliable at all times and always kept his word. Working on a project with Tayfun was a thoroughly positive experience.

fabion2.name: Fabion Latifi II
fabion2.text: Ty places great importance on effective communication, which fosters a collaborative and efficient working environment. Tayfun is disciplined and produces clean, reusable code that adheres to best practices. His design-oriented approach ensures that his solutions are both functional and aesthetically pleasing, enhancing the overall user experience. Tayfuns ability to work effectively and productively ensured that all projects were completed to the highest standard, making him an invaluable asset to any team.

footer.personalMessage: This is digital art at its finest. Every line of code was written by me. This website was developed with HTML, SCSS, CSS, JSON, JavaScript, TypeScript and Angular

fundraising.p: Our mission is to change the lives of those suffering under the harsh conditions of poverty, abuse, and neglect.
fundraising.p-core: As it says in Ephesians 5:8, “For you were once darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of light.
fundraising.span: Matthew 19:14 Jesus said, “Let the little children come to me, and do not hinder them, for the kingdom of heaven belongs to such as these. - Your contribution matters 💚
